long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this add-on, generating strong and secure passwords becomes easy.

You can define the length of the password and the characters used (lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, custom characters and spaces). The generated password can be easily copied to the clipboard.
